patthana16.36:4.1: Parittaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.36:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe ekādasa … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.36:5.1: Parittaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.36:5.3: Hetuyā cuddasa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate cuddasa.
